name: Shrike
description:
Description:

Enemies are spawning out of a black hole and you must joust them with your spearship.

The ship can boost both defensively to avoid bullets, and offensively to destroy enemy ships while they are vulnerable.

Created for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam

Platforms: 

  • WebGL

3rd Party Assets:

  • Unity
  • Photofunia Retro Wave Effect
  • sfxr
  • MS Paint
  • GIMP2

Contributors: 

  • Joethemerciless
